name: Catch & Match
description:
'Catch & Match' is a simple yet entertaining photo catch and match game. First choose one of the target photos or let the app choose the target photo at random and then try to capture the target photo with your camera.

If your captured photo matches the target photo, you will win a bronze camera, a silver camera or a gold camera, it depends on the precision of the match between the captured photo and the target photo, try to be as accurate as possible.

Can you catch and match all the target photos and win all the golden cameras?

Free download 'Catch & Match'!!

--------------------------------------

'Catch & Match' by J.ValeskaDevs
